english.segment1: You're the only one I know / You're the only one I'll show. Just how deep my love runs through. I take a leap of faith towards you. I face the whole world. Living fearless / Take me as I am. Know me, this is who I am
english.segment2: You're why I've searched this world/ You're what I've waited for. Stay here won't you please / Dance to me
english.segment3: You've showed me for the first time / Love so perfect, so divine. Show me how, turn me around / touch me now, feeling the sound. I can see you / Flow so freely. Turning, then you look at me and say
english.segment4: CHORUS 1: You're why I've searched this world / You're what I'm waiting for. Stay here just for awhile / Stay here just you and I
english.segment5: CHORUS 2: You're all I'm dreaming of / You waking in my arms. Stay here won't you please / Dance to me
